thread.title: Josh Kelley Shares Adorable New Snap of His 'Happy Little Dude' With Katherine Heigl -- See the Pic!
thread.title_full: Josh Kelley Shares Adorable New Snap of His 'Happy Little Dude' With Katherine Heigl -- See the Pic!

author: Jennifer Drysdale
title: Josh Kelley Shares Adorable New Snap of His 'Happy Little Dude' With Katherine Heigl -- See the Pic!
text: Josh Kelley Shares Adorable New Snap of His 'Happy Little Dude' With Katherine Heigl -- See the Pic! by Jennifer Drysdale 7:10   Photo: Getty Images Joshua Bishop Kelley Jr. is one "happy little dude"! Josh Kelley took to Instagram on Wednesday to share a sweet new photo of his son with Katherine Heigl, showing off baby Joshua's adorable morning excitement. A post shared by Josh Kelley (@joshbkelley) on Feb 22, 2017 at 9:10am PST Though Joshua isn't Kelley and Heigl's first child -- the two are already parents to adopted daughters Naleigh, 8, and Adalaide, 4 -- they definitely can't get enough of their newborn son… and Heigl is already ready for more! ET caught up with the Doubt star last week, where she gushed about adding to her family. "I think once you have two, it doesn’t matter anymore!" she laughed. "I've already tried to have this conversation, but it's so funny -- at eight weeks, [Kelley is] like, 'I'm not talking about this right now!'" See more in the video below. RELATED SLIDESHOW
